name: Keketso “Cake” Moteetee
bio: Co-founder, storyteller, and concept chef. 9 years of media expertise with a sweet touch for pre-production and production leadership.

name: Thivhusiwi “Tea” Mamaila
bio: Co-founder, post-pro wizard, and videography barista. With 9 years in the game, he delivers smooth and satisfying final cuts.
